lead_paragraph: European soccer body UEFA will hold a "moment of applause" before the Poland v Portugal Euro 2016 quarter-finals on Thursday in memory of victims of the gun and bomb attack at Istanbul's main airport this week.

headline.print_headline: UEFA to Hold 'Moment of Applause' for Istanbul Attack Victims
headline.main: UEFA to Hold 'Moment of Applause' for Istanbul Attack Victims
